org.cougaar.core.agent
Interface AgentBootstrapService

All Superinterfaces:
Service
public interface AgentBootstrapService
extends Service

This service allows a component to modify its agent's list of components as it is being loaded, which is part of the agent's bootstrap process.

This is only for use by Bootstrap and FindComponentsEarly, to override the default list of components with a persisted list that specifies the dynamically added/removed components.

This service can only be used during agent "load()", and can only be used to view or modify the list of ComponentDescriptions that have not be loaded yet. A component must use this service within its "load()" method.
